ul.li1: 1The Spirit of the Lord Yahweh is upon me,
ul.li2: because Yahweh has anointed me,
ul.li1: he has sent me to bring good news to the oppressed,
ul.li2: to bind up the brokenhearted,Literally “those broken of heart”
ul.li1: to proclaimLiterally “call” release to the captives
ul.li2: and liberation to those who are bound,
ul.li1: 2to proclaimLiterally “call” the year of Yahweh’s favor,
ul.li2: and our God’s day of vengeance,
ul.li1: to comfort all those in mourning,
ul.li2: 3to giveLiterally “place” for those in mourning in Zion,
ul.li1: to give them a head wrap instead of ashes,
ul.li2: the oil of joy instead of mourning,
a garment of praise instead of a faint spirit.
ul.li1: And they will be calledLiterally “it will be called to them” oaks of righteousness,
ul.li2: the planting of Yahweh, to show his glory.
ul.li1: 4And they shall build the ancient ruins,
ul.li2: they shall erect the former deserted places.
ul.li1: And they shall restore the devastated cities,Literally “cities of devastation”
ul.li2: the deserted places of many generations.Literally “generation and generation”
ul.li1: 5And strangers shall stand and feed your flocks,Hebrew “flock”
ul.li2: and foreignersLiterally “sons of a foreign country” shall be your farmers and vinedressers.
ul.li1: 6ButOr “And” you shall be called the priests of Yahweh,
ul.li2: you will be calledLiterally “it shall be said of you” servers of our God.
ul.li1: You shall eat the wealth of the nations,
ul.li2: and you shall boast in their riches.
ul.li1: 7Instead of your shame, a double portion,
ul.li2: and instead of insult, they will rejoice over their portion.
ul.li1: Therefore they will take a double portion in their land;
ul.li2: they shall possess everlasting joy.Literally “possession of joy everlasting shall be for them”
ul.li1: 8For I, Yahweh, love justice,
ul.li2: hate robbery andOr “in” injustice,
ul.li1: and I will faithfullyLiterally “in the faithfulness” give their reward,
ul.li2: and I will makeLiterally “cut” an everlasting covenant withLiterally “to” them.
ul.li1: 9And their descendantsHebrew “descendant” will be known among the nations,
ul.li2: and their offspring in the midst of the peoples.
ul.li1: All those who see them shall recognize them,
ul.li2: that they are descendantsHebrew “descendant” whom Yahweh has blessed.
ul.li1: 10I will rejoice greatly in Yahweh;
ul.li2: my being shall shout in exultation in my God.
ul.li1: For he has clothed me with garments of salvation,
ul.li2: he has covered me with the robe of righteousness,
ul.li1: as a bridegroom adorns himself with a head wrap like a priest,
ul.li2: and as a bride adorns herself with her jewelry.
ul.li1: 11For as the earth producesLiterally “brings out” its sprout,
ul.li2: and as a garden makes its plants sprout,
ul.li1: so the Lord Yahweh will make righteousness sprout,
ul.li2: and praise before all the nations.
